# Government Tender Announcement
**Title:** ITT DND D200 Oven Exhaust Ventilation
**Reference Number:** WS4457994865-Doc4574616351
**Solicitation Number:** WS4457994865

## Tender Information

* **Publication Date:** May 9, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** June 11, 2024, at 2:00 PM
* **Amendment Date:** June 10, 2024
* **Tender Status:** Expired

## Project Overview

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is soliciting bids for the removal and installation of ductwork and electrical to support a new Industrial Oven at building D200 at the Halifax Dockyard. The project value is estimated to be between $100,001 and $500,000. Delivery date is within twenty weeks following contract award.

## Key Requirements

* The successful bidder must provide all plant, labor, equipment, and materials necessary to complete the work.
* Bid security is required for this tender.
* Qualified suppliers who responded to the Invitation to Qualify have been invited to participate in this solicitation.

## Procurement Details

* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Delivery: Nova Scotia

## Contracting Entity

* Department of National Defence (DND) - End User Entity
* Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) - Contracting Entity
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5

## Contact Information

* Adam Beaumaster, PSPC/SPAC
* Email: adam.beaumaster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Note:** Direct any inquiries or requests for clarification to the designated contact.
